message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10800. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $10800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $10200. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9500. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
